segments.text: I see the woman in the kitchen, so absorbed in her task of drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is fixed on the plate, and it makes me feel a little happy to see her in her element.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then, I notice the water overflowing from the sink, pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see it? It's such a glaring issue!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calmness of the outside garden contrasts sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of fear for the kids who are up to something mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that rickety stool, and it looks like an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below him, her eager hand outstretched, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They both seem to have no idea how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get away with this or if the woman will catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR
